WorkItem.Description:
The application crashes if too large files have to be generated. Probably this is due to some server memory limits, as the tool requires much memory. Are any settings or configuration that can reduce memory usage? Are you planning to work on memory issues in further releases?
Thanks!

Comments.Message:
There is already a work item for this:
"Improving performance and memory on data dumps"
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=6857

Some more info in this thread:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=50682
